channel.title: PauseAI
channel.description: Halt the development of AI models that are too dangerous to be deployed.

item.title: Environmental impact of AI
item.description: AI's environmental impact is a problem not just because of the immediate human cost, but because robots are fantastically energy-hungry and thus accelerate the unsustainable, insupportable damage we are doing to Earth.
